mapper.select: SELECT D.DETAIL_PLAN_NO, D.DETAIL_PLAN_YMD, D.DETAIL_PLAN_HOUR, D.DETAIL_PLAN_HOUR_END, P.ROAD_NAME_ADR, P.PLACE_CATEGORY FROM DETAIL_PLAN_TB D JOIN PLACE_TB P ON D.PLACE_NO = P.PLACE_NO WHERE D.DETAIL_PLAN_NO = #{no}

SELECT MTB.rnstam, MTB.rnstpm, MTB.wfam, MTB.wfpm, MTB.tamin, MTB.tamax, MTB.forecast_day FROM MEDIUM_TERM_FORECAST_TB MTB INNER JOIN SECOND_PRECINCT_TB SPB ON MTB.SECOND_PRECINCT_NO = SPB.SECOND_PRECINCT_NO WHERE SPB.SECOND_PRECINCT = #{address} AND MTB.forecast_day = #{date} AND MTB.ANNOUNCE_DAY = ( SELECT MAX(ANNOUNCE_DAY) FROM MEDIUM_TERM_FORECAST_TB WHERE SECOND_PRECINCT_NO = SPB.SECOND_PRECINCT_NO )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DETAIL_PLAN_BLOCK_TB (DETAIL_PLAN_NO, COLOR, REASON) VALUES (#{plan_No}, #{color}, #{Reason})
mapper.select: SELECT DETAIL_PLAN_NO, COLOR, REASON FROM DETAIL_PLAN_BLOCK_TB
